attributes.action: Include people waiting to start a new job to be included in Furlough payments
attributes.additional_details: There are thousands of honest and hard working people unable to claim furlough. These people were waiting to start new jobs, with a contract and it is now delayed because of Coronavirus. These people should not be left behind or punished for accepting new jobs.
attributes.background: Within the guidelines of the new furlough plan anyone who was between jobs is not entitled to a penny. If a work contract is in place and their new employers agree a future start date allow them to be included.
